title: Comics - The 9th Art
description:
Comics - The 9th Art
====================

TV documentary series first broadcast in 1990 ( I *think* ) tracing the history of comic books from 1900 to then present day.

Covers not just American comic books but all major contributors to the genre from all over the world.

13 half-hour episodes.

I *think* the programme was made by a Basque company but it is in English and any non-English dialogue has English subtitles.

Digitised from video tape of recording from original TV broadcast.

For those that are obsessed only with American superheroes then just watch episodes 5 and 11.
